data.title: Ashley Estate, Mailoor Estate , The Stagbrook , Kutikul estate, Paalali Estate, AVG Motors, AVG Vehicle Sales & Services,Fresh fields,Ashley Bungalow,Tea plantations,Ruuber plantattions,AVG motors,AVG
data.meta_description: The AVG Group of Companies is one of the oldest business houses based in the region. The Group was founded in 1937 by the late A.V George, a visionary and distinguished public personality of the time. Mr. A.V George was the Municipal Chairman for three terms and was instrumental in developing Kottayam. a town in the Central Travancore region of Kerala, India, into a modern township.  After AV George's demise, the Group was managed by Varkey George (Managing Director of A. V, George and Company Ltd., and Kailas Rubber Company Ltd.,
